snippet: Greenpeace lost about $5.2 million on an ill-timed bet in the currency market by a well-intentioned, if reckless, employee in its finance department, the environmental group said.
abstract: Greenpeace says it lost 3.8 million euros, or about $5.2 million, on ill-timed bet in the currency market by a well-intentioned, if reckless, employee in its finance department.
lead_paragraph: Greenpeace lost about $5.2 million on an ill-timed bet in the currency market by a well-intentioned, if reckless, employee in its finance department, the environmental group said.

headline.main: Greenpeace Says It Lost $5 Million on Currency Market
headline.print_headline: Greenpeace Says It Lost $5 Million on Currency Market
